divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my bedroom an my mother called me from outside on the balcony and when i got there she pointed out to sea and there was a red glowing orbe she said she was watching it for 5 minutes then as we were standing there watching it another one blincked in to the right of it i couldent beleave what i had just seen it just apaired i ran and got my banoqolars and looked atthem to see if i could see any blincking lights of any kind but they were solled red orbes then the one to the left blincked out an dthen a few minutes laiter the other one did the same. iwas a trained observer in the US Marine Corps a Scout Sniper for six years and I know they werent any kind of plane one second they were there and another second they were gone. My mother saw the same thing.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around September 21st 2009
Summary: 2 red orbs off coast over the ocean
